mdRecord.dcterms:title: Storer College Cornet Band with Instruments, Harpers Ferry, W. Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Group portrait of Storer College Cornet Band members with instruments on lawn. Pictured: 'B. Debbis, C. Dennis, John W. McKinney, T. Herrod, Trulia Jones, Eugene Jones, C. McKinney, Prof. Saunders, W. Harris.'
